questions.question: Highlight the path from the Live Streaming channel to observe which business category receives the highest GMV contribution from it.

answer.value: Live Streaming contributes the highest GMV to the Fresh Food category.

key_insights: Live streaming has a relatively small contribution to the Electronics & Appliances category.

reasoning.reasoning: Isolating the live streaming channel using a filter allows us to directly assess its impact on each business category, avoiding the visual clutter of other acquisition channels
